General.Name: P/F BankNordik
General.Description: P/F BankNordik, together with its subsidiaries, provides personal and corporate banking services in the Faroe Islands and Greenland. The company operates in two segments, Banking and Non-Life Insurance. It provides a range of property and casualty insurance products under the Trygd brand, and life insurance products under the NordikLív brand; and real estate agency services under the Skyn brand. P/F BankNordik was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in Tórshavn, Denmark.

1.Name: Ms. Turio F. Arge
1.Title: EVP, Head of Marketing, Personal Banking & Group Devel. and Chief Commercial Officer

2.Name: Mr. Rune  Norregaard
2.Title: CFO and Head of Credit Services, Fin., Accounting, Treasury & IT
